Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Enacts the "gas tax holiday act of 2022"
Summary: Enacts the "gas tax holiday act of 2022"; provides that from the first of the month after the effective date of the section until December 31, 2022 the taxes imposed on retail sales of fuel gas, motor fuel and diesel motor fuel shall be exempt from certain taxes.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the state finance law, and the general business law, in relation to enacting the "gas tax holiday act of 2022"
